entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Cuando lanzas este hechizo usando una ranura de hechizo de 4º nivel o superior, el daño aumenta en {@damage 2d4} de daño por cada nivel de ranura superior al 3º.

spell.name: Mummify
entries: Tocas a una criatura humanoide y pronuncias una antigua maldición. El objetivo debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de Fuerza o recibir {@damage 4d8} de daño necrótico y quedar inmovilizado mientras las envolturas espectrales comienzan a apretarse alrededor de su cuerpo. Hasta que el hechizo termine, como acción en cada uno de tus turnos, puedes hacer que el objetivo reciba un {@damage 2d8} de daño necrótico adicional cada asalto después de que el hechizo fuera lanzado inicialmente. El objetivo puede usar su acción para hacer una tirada de salvación de Fuerza, rompiendo las envolturas espectrales y terminando el hechizo.

Una criatura que muere mientras está bajo el efecto de este hechizo se convierte en un {@creature mummy} que es amigo tuyo y de tus compañeros durante el tiempo restante. Tira la iniciativa por la momia, que tiene sus propios turnos. Obedece cualquier orden verbal que le des (no se requiere ninguna acción por tu parte). Si no le das ninguna orden, la momia se defiende de las criaturas hostiles, pero no realiza ninguna otra acción. Una vez alcanzada la duración, la momia muere y se convierte en cenizas.

Si se rompe tu concentración, la momia no muere. En cambio, pierdes el control de la momia, que se vuelve hostil hacia ti y tus compañeros y te ataca. Una momia no controlada no puede ser despedida por ti, y se convierte en cenizas 10 minutos después de que el hechizo fuera lanzado inicialmente. El DM tiene las estadísticas de la momia.

spell.name: Poison Darts
entries: Conjuras {@dice 2d4} dardos mágicos que duran una hora o hasta que se usan. Como acción en tu turno, puedes gastar uno de los dardos para realizar un ataque de hechizo a distancia contra una criatura que puedas ver dentro del alcance. Con un ataque exitoso, infliges {@damage 2d6} de daño por veneno al objetivo y lo obligas a realizar una tirada de salvación de Constitución o se convierte en {@condition poisoned} hasta el final de su siguiente turno.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Cuando lanzas este hechizo utilizando una ranura de hechizo de 4º nivel o superior, invocas y dardos adicionales {@dice 1d4} y duran 1 hora adicional por cada nivel de ranura superior al 3º.

spell.name: Poisoned Heart
entries: Tocas a una criatura y haces que su corazón se llene de un vil veneno. La criatura debe realizar una tirada de salvación de Constitución o recibir {@damage 2d10} de daño por veneno. Al final de cada uno de los turnos del objetivo antes de que el hechizo termine, el objetivo debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de Constitución o recibir un {@damage 2d10} de daño por veneno adicional.

En cualquier momento durante el hechizo, si el objetivo muere como resultado del daño de veneno de este hechizo, todas las criaturas en un radio de 1,5 metros del objetivo deben hacer una tirada de salvación de Constitución mientras el corazón del objetivo explota. La criatura recibe {@damage 4d10} de daño por veneno si falla la tirada de salvación, o la mitad si tiene éxito.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Cuando lanzas este hechizo utilizando una ranura de hechizo de 4º nivel o superior, todo el daño infligido por el hechizo aumenta un {@dice 1d10} por cada nivel de ranura superior al 3º.

spell.name: Predominance
entries: Intentas liberar el poder que contiene tu ser. Cuando lances este hechizo por primera vez, tira un {@dice d20}. Si el resultado es superior a la diferencia de 20 y tu modificador de lanzamiento de hechizos, ganas 3 dados de predominio. Durante la siguiente hora, puedes utilizar cada uno de estos dados para ganar ventaja en una sola tirada de {@dice d20}, momento en el que el dado se gasta.

spell.name: Return

time.condition: which you take after you see a creature move

entries: Utilizando tu reacción, puedes hacer que una criatura regrese al espacio que acaba de dejar libre con su movimiento actual. Si puedes ver a una criatura dentro del alcance y eres capaz de ver su ubicación original (aunque no es necesario que esté dentro del alcance), el objetivo debe hacer una tirada de salvación de Carisma o ser teletransportado de vuelta a su punto de origen donde comenzó su turno actual. El objetivo no recupera su velocidad de movimiento. Una criatura puede elegir fallar la tirada de salvación si lo desea.

spell.name: Sacred Ward
entries: Colocas una protección divina con tres cargas sobre una criatura de tu elección que puedas ver dentro del alcance. Después de que el objetivo reciba daño, recupera puntos de golpe iguales a {@dice 2d8} + tu modificador de habilidad de lanzamiento de conjuros, y el pabellón pierde una carga.

Una vez que el objetivo está curado, el pabellón salta hasta 30 pies a otra criatura de tu elección. Cuando el pabellón pierde todas sus cargas, el hechizo termina. Este hechizo no tiene efecto sobre los muertos vivientes o las construcciones.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Cuando lanzas este hechizo utilizando una ranura de hechizo de 4º nivel o superior, el pabellón gana una carga adicional por cada nivel de ranura superior al 3º.

spell.name: Scaleskin

m.text: dragon scale worth 300 gp

entries: Tocas a una criatura dispuesta. Hasta que el hechizo termine, la piel del objetivo tiene un aspecto suave y escamoso, y su CA no puede ser inferior a 18, independientemente del tipo de armadura que lleve. Además, el objetivo se vuelve resistente a un solo tipo de daño dependiendo del tipo de escama de dragón que utilices: blanca (frío), roja (fuego), azul (rayo), negra (ácido) o verde (veneno).

spell.name: Spectral Steed

m.text: Onyx dust worth 50 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: Invocas un espíritu que adopta la forma de un corcel inusualmente inteligente, fuerte y leal, creando un vínculo duradero con él.

Al aparecer en un espacio desocupado dentro de su alcance, el corcel adopta la forma que elijas: un {@creature warhorse}, un {@creature pony}, un {@creature camel}, un {@creature elk} o un {@creature mastiff}. El corcel tiene las estadísticas de la forma elegida, aunque es una criatura no muerta incorpórea en lugar de su tipo normal, y gana el rasgo de Movimiento incorpóreo, aunque no puede usarlo mientras está montado. Además, si tu corcel tiene una Inteligencia de 5 o menos, su Inteligencia pasa a ser de 6, y gana la capacidad de entender un idioma de tu elección que tú hables.

Tu corcel te sirve de montura, tanto en combate como fuera de él, y tienes un vínculo instintivo con él que te permite luchar como una unidad sin fisuras. Mientras estás montado en tu corcel, puedes hacer que cualquier hechizo que lances y que sólo te apunte a ti también apunte a tu corcel.

Cuando el corcel baja a 0 puntos de vida, desaparece, sin dejar ninguna forma física. También puedes descartar tu corcel en cualquier momento como acción, haciendo que desaparezca. En cualquier caso, al lanzar este hechizo se vuelve a invocar el mismo corcel, restaurado a su máximo de puntos de vida. Mientras tu corcel esté a menos de 1 milla de ti, puedes comunicarte con él telepáticamente. No puedes tener más de un corcel unido por este hechizo a la vez. Como acción, puedes liberar al corcel de su vínculo en cualquier momento, haciéndolo desaparecer.

spell.name: Sphere of Deceit

m.text: dragon scale worth 300 gp

entries: Creas una zona mágica que permite el engaño en una esfera de 15 pies de radio en un punto de tu elección dentro del alcance. Hasta que el hechizo termine, cualquier criatura de tu elección que entre en el área del hechizo gana ventaja en todos los chequeos de habilidad de Engaño.

Además, cualquier criatura en el área del hechizo a la que no le concedas esta bonificación debe hacer una tirada de salvación de Sabiduría o sufrir desventaja en todos los chequeos de Sabiduría ({@skill Insight}) realizados mientras esté en el área. Cuando el hechizo termina, saben que fueron engañados de esta manera.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Cuando lanzas este hechizo utilizando una ranura de hechizo de 4º nivel o superior, el radio de la esfera aumenta en 3 metros por cada nivel de ranura superior al 3º.

spell.name: Steady Terrain
entries: Transformas el suelo, permitiéndote a ti y a tus aliados atravesarlo con facilidad. Mientras dure, eliminas todo el terreno difícil a lo largo de una línea de 5 pies de ancho y 60 pies de largo que se origina en un punto que toques en la dirección que elijas. Si el terreno es difícil debido a un conjuro mágico, este conjuro anula esa condición del otro conjuro si fue lanzado a 3er nivel o inferior.

Cuando se lanza sobre una superficie que requeriría un chequeo de habilidad de Fuerza ({@skill Athletics}) para atravesarla, cualquier criatura que elijas puede hacer los chequeos de habilidad con ventaja.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Cuando lanzas este hechizo utilizando una ranura de hechizo de 4º nivel o superior, la longitud de la línea aumenta en 30 pies por cada nivel de ranura superior al 3º.

spell.name: Thunderous Bellow
entries: Gritas una frase atronadora que estalla desde tu ubicación. Cada criatura en un cono de 6 metros debe hacer una tirada de salvación de Constitución. Una criatura recibe {@damage 4d8} de daño por trueno y es empujada 15 pies lejos de ti si falla la salvación, o la mitad de daño y no es empujada si tiene éxito.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Cuando lanzas este hechizo utilizando una ranura de hechizo de 4º nivel o superior, el daño aumenta un {@dice 1d8} por cada nivel de ranura superior al 3º.

spell.name: Vaporous Smite
entries: La próxima vez que golpees a una criatura con un ataque de arma cuerpo a cuerpo durante la duración de este hechizo, tu arma se ilumina con un manto blanco brumoso y el ataque inflige un {@damage 3d8} de daño radiante adicional al objetivo. Inmediatamente después del ataque, tu forma se convierte en un vapor gaseoso y puedes viajar hasta 15 pies sin provocar ataques de oportunidad. Vuelves a tu forma normal al final de tu turno.

spell.name: Wyrmling's Vitriol
entries: Tocas a una criatura y le otorgas la capacidad de aprovechar el dominio del ácido tóxico de un dragón negro. Mientras dure, el objetivo es resistente al daño por ácido y puede usar una acción en sus turnos para lanzar una bola de ácido verde oscuro hasta 30 pies en línea recta. La bola de ácido golpea a la primera criatura en su camino, que debe hacer una tirada de salvación de Destreza. La criatura recibe {@damage 4d4} de daño por ácido si falla la tirada de salvación, o la mitad de daño si tiene éxito. Además, si la criatura falla su tirada de salvación, cada criatura en un radio de 1,5 metros debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de Destreza o recibir {@damage 1d4} de daño por ácido.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Cuando lanzas este hechizo utilizando una ranura de hechizo de 4º nivel o superior, ambas instancias de daño aumentan en {@dice 1d4} por cada dos niveles de ranura superiores al 3º.

spell.name: Amorphous Form
entries: Tocas a una criatura con al menos 1 punto de golpe, transformándola en un {@creature gray ooze}. Una criatura que no esté dispuesta puede hacer una tirada de salvación de Sabiduría para evitar el efecto.

La transformación dura hasta que el objetivo cae a 0 puntos de vida o muere. Las estadísticas del juego del objetivo, incluyendo las puntuaciones de habilidad mental, son reemplazadas por las estadísticas de un excremento gris. Conserva su Alineamiento y personalidad.

El objetivo asume los Puntos de Vida de su nueva forma. Cuando vuelve a su forma normal, la criatura recupera el número de puntos de vida que tenía antes de transformarse. Si revierte como resultado de la reducción a 0 puntos de vida, cualquier exceso de daño se traslada a su forma normal. Mientras el exceso de daño no reduzca la forma normal de la criatura a 0 puntos de vida, no queda inconsciente. La criatura está limitada en las acciones que puede realizar por la naturaleza de su nueva forma, y no puede hablar, lanzar hechizos o realizar cualquier otra acción que requiera las manos o el habla.
El equipo del objetivo se funde con la nueva forma. La criatura no puede activar, utilizar, blandir ni beneficiarse de ninguna manera de su equipo.

spell.name: Analyze Blood
entries: Puedes aprender un número de cualidades de una onza de sangre fresca, siempre que no tenga más de 24 horas. Tira un {@dice d4} y elige un número de cualidades para aprender de la lista que aparece a continuación, igual a la puntuación del dado:

items: Conoce la edad de la criatura (si es el caso)
Conoce el sexo de la criatura (si es el caso)
Saber si la sangre lleva algún rastro de veneno o enfermedad
Saber si la criatura está a menos de 20 millas de su ubicación
Saber si la criatura sigue en su plano de existencia

Si lanzas este hechizo utilizando una ranura de hechizo, además de la información aprendida anteriormente, también verás una breve visión del momento justo antes de que la criatura derrame sangre, desde su perspectiva.

spell.name: Avian Geyser
entries: Una ráfaga de viento comienza a arremolinarse en torno a un lugar del suelo que puedes ver a tu alcance, culminando con potencia. Después de un breve momento, un géiser de viento de 3 metros de diámetro y hasta 60 metros de altura se dispara bruscamente en el aire. Cualquier criatura mediana o pequeña que pise el géiser o se encuentre en su espacio cuando se crea el géiser debe hacer una tirada de salvación de Destreza o ser levantada en el aire hasta el pico del géiser. Las criaturas grandes hacen su tirada de salvación de Destreza con ventaja, y las criaturas enormes o más grandes no se ven afectadas.

spell.name: Barricade
entries: Creas un muro vertical semitransparente hecho de fuerza mágica (CA 25, 10 PV). El muro es un objeto sólido y aparece dentro de su alcance. Dura lo que dure o hasta que reciba daño. Puedes hacer un muro recto de hasta 40 pies de largo, 40 pies de alto y 5 pies de grosor. El muro proporciona cobertura total a las criaturas a ambos lados de él y sólo las criaturas que permitas pueden atravesarlo.

spell.name: Cognizant
entries: Tocas a una criatura dispuesta, permitiéndole añadir su bonificación de competencia a todas las tiradas de iniciativa y a todos los chequeos de habilidad basados en la Inteligencia mientras dure el hechizo. Sólo puedes tener una instancia de este hechizo activa a la vez.

spell.name: Consecration

m.text: a holy symbol, vial of holy water and incense worth 20 gp, which is consumed

entries: La energía divina se extiende desde un punto que toques en el suelo para llenar un círculo de 15 pies de radio mientras dure. La energía se extiende por las esquinas. Mientras dure, las criaturas que elijas dentro del círculo tienen ventaja en las tiradas de salvación de Sabiduría y en los chequeos de habilidad. Una criatura no muerta debe tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de Carisma para entrar voluntariamente en el área, y sufre desventaja en las tiradas de salvación de Sabiduría y los chequeos de habilidad mientras esté dentro del área.

Cuando el hechizo termina, el área es bendecida por energía positiva y se convierte en terreno consagrado. Si la zona contiene un altar, santuario u otro elemento permanente dedicado a una deidad, panteón o poder superior con ideales muy diferentes a los representados por el símbolo sagrado utilizado en el lanzamiento, se destruye.

spell.name: Desecration

m.text: an unholy symbol, vial of unholy water and incense worth 20 gp, which is consumed

entries: La energía impía se propaga desde un punto que tocas en el suelo para llenar un círculo de 15 pies de radio mientras dure. La energía se extiende por las esquinas. Mientras dure, una criatura no muerta dentro del círculo tiene ventaja en las tiradas de salvación de Sabiduría y en los chequeos de habilidad. Además, si comienzan su turno en el círculo, ganan {@dice 2d6} puntos de golpe temporales. Las criaturas que elijas sufren desventaja en las tiradas de salvación de Sabiduría y en los chequeos de habilidad mientras estén dentro del área.

Cuando el hechizo termina, la zona queda contaminada por la energía impía y se convierte en suelo profanado. Si la zona contiene un altar, santuario u otro elemento permanente dedicado a una deidad, panteón o poder superior con ideales muy diferentes a los representados por el símbolo sagrado utilizado en el lanzamiento, se destruye.

spell.name: Detect Familiar
entries: Mientras dure el efecto, percibes la presencia de cualquier criatura que te sirva de familiar en un radio de 30 pies. Si percibes a un familiar de esta manera, puedes usar tu acción para ver un aura débil alrededor de la criatura. Además, eres capaz de percibir si su amo está en un radio de 1 milla de tu ubicación y conocer su dirección general.
El hechizo puede penetrar la mayoría de las barreras, pero es bloqueado por 1 pie de piedra, 1 pulgada de metal común, una hoja delgada de plomo, o 3 pies de madera o tierra.

spell.name: Divine Ward

components.m: some hair, fingernail clippings, or other piece of the creature's body

entries: Colocas tu mano sobre una criatura dispuesta y creas un vínculo mágico entre tú y tu objetivo. Durante las siguientes 24 horas, cualquier hechizo con un alcance de toque que lances sobre el objetivo puede ser lanzado desde un máximo de 30 pies de distancia.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Cuando lanzas este hechizo utilizando una ranura de hechizo de 3er nivel o superior, el alcance aumenta en 5 pies por cada nivel de ranura superior al 2º.

spell.name: Druthers
entries: Haces una petición simple de hasta 10 palabras, ganando un bono de +5 y ventaja en los chequeos de habilidad de Persuasión a todos los humanoides en un radio de 30 pies de ti.

spell.name: Elemental Anguish
entries: Extiendes tu dedo y apuntas a una criatura mientras murmuras una maldición gutural. El objetivo tiene hasta el final de su siguiente turno para alejarse 60 pies o más de ti.

Si el objetivo falla o decide no alejarse de ti, debe realizar inmediatamente una tirada de salvación de Constitución o perder su resistencia a uno de los siguientes tipos de daño: ácido, frío, fuego, rayo o trueno (a tu elección) durante 1 minuto. Las criaturas con inmunidad al tipo elegido son tratadas como si tuvieran resistencia al daño. Un hechizo de eliminar maldición pone fin a este efecto.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Cuando lanzas este hechizo usando una ranura de hechizo de 3er nivel o superior, puedes elegir otro tipo de daño por cada dos niveles de ranura por encima del 2º.

spell.name: Gale of Obscurity
entries: Invocas una ventisca que te oculta de las demás criaturas. Mientras dure, el vendaval te proporciona media cobertura, resistencia al daño por fuego y cualquier criatura que comience su turno o se mueva a menos de 1,5 metros de ti por primera vez recibe {@damage 1d6} de daño por frío.
Mientras el vendaval está activo, sufres desventaja en todos los ataques con armas a distancia y hechizos.

spell.name: Glacious
entries: El suelo se congela en una esfera de 10 pies de radio centrada en un punto que elijas dentro del alcance. Cualquier criatura que comience su turno o se mueva dentro del área por primera vez debe hacer una tirada de salvación de Constitución o recibir {@damage 2d8} de daño por frío y ganar un nivel de {@condition exhaustion}. Si la salvación tiene éxito, la criatura recibe la mitad de daño y no sufre agotamiento. Las criaturas resistentes o inmunes al daño por frío tienen automáticamente éxito en la tirada de salvación.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Cuando lanzas este hechizo utilizando una ranura de hechizo de 3er nivel o superior, el daño aumenta un {@dice 1d8} por cada nivel de ranura superior al 2º.

spell.name: Grimlore's Shadowgrasp
entries: Creas una mano flotante hecha de sombra en un espacio desocupado que puedas ver a tu alcance. Cuando lanzas el conjuro, puedes hacer un ataque de conjuro cuerpo a cuerpo contra una criatura en un radio de 5 pies de la mano de sombra. En un impacto, el objetivo recibe {@dice 1d12} de daño necrótico y debe hacer una tirada de salvación de Sabiduría o estar {@condition frightened} de ti hasta el final de su siguiente turno.
Como acción de bonificación, puedes mover la mano sombría hasta 20 pies y repetir el ataque contra una criatura a 5 pies de distancia.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Cuando lanzas este hechizo utilizando una ranura de hechizo de 3er nivel o superior, el daño infligido por la mano aumenta en {@dice 1d12} por cada dos niveles de ranura de hechizo superiores al 2º.

spell.name: Holy Missile
entries: Creas tres dardos brillantes de energía sagrada. Cada dardo golpea a una criatura de tu elección que puedas ver dentro del alcance. Cada dardo cura a su objetivo en {@dice 1d4} puntos de vida. Los dardos golpean simultáneamente, y puedes dirigirlos para que golpeen a una o varias criaturas.

spell.name: Howling Downpour
entries: Invocas una nube de tormenta hasta 60 pies por encima del suelo en un punto que puedas ver a tu alcance. Después de {@dice 1d4} asaltos, las nubes producen lluvia a un ritmo alarmante, empapando todo lo que hay en un cilindro de 10 pies de radio por debajo de la nube. La lluvia extingue inmediatamente todo el fuego no mágico dentro del área.
Como acción adicional en tu turno, puedes mover la nube hasta 30 pies en cualquier dirección que no exceda el alcance del hechizo y hasta una altura máxima de 60 pies.

spell.name: Mana Burn
entries: Creas una bola mágica de energía resplandeciente y la lanzas contra una criatura que puedas ver dentro del alcance. El objetivo debe hacer una tirada de salvación de Inteligencia o recibir {@damage 1d6} de daño psíquico y perder una ranura de conjuro de 2º nivel no utilizada hasta que complete un descanso largo. Si el objetivo no tiene ninguna ranura de conjuro de 2º nivel restante, perderá una ranura de conjuro de 1º nivel en su lugar.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Cuando lanzas este hechizo utilizando una ranura de hechizo de 3er nivel o superior, el daño aumenta en {@dice 1d6} por cada nivel de ranura superior al 2º. Además, la ranura de hechizo no utilizada que pierde el objetivo es igual a la ranura de hechizo utilizada para lanzar el hechizo. Si el objetivo no tiene un nivel de ranura sin usar de ese nivel para perder, perderá una ranura de hechizo del siguiente nivel inferior, y así sucesivamente, hasta que pierda una ranura de hechizo sin usar. Si el objetivo no tiene ninguna ranura de hechizo sin usar del nivel apropiado, el hechizo no hace nada y termina.

spell.name: Manacle of Burden
entries: Apuntas a dos criaturas que estén a menos de 20 pies de distancia entre sí dentro del alcance y haces que hagan una tirada de salvación de Fuerza con desventaja. Si ambos objetivos fallan, quedan unidos entre sí por un manáculo espectral de tu creación y dividirán todo el daño que reciban.
Durante la duración, cualquier daño hecho a cualquiera de los objetivos se reduce a la mitad (redondeado hacia abajo) y luego se reparte también a la otra criatura atada.
Si las dos criaturas atadas se mueven a más de 6 metros de distancia, el grillete se rompe causando {@damage 4d6} de daño necrótico a cada objetivo.

spell.name: Mountains to Molehills
entries: Tocas una superficie lisa que sea difícil o imposible de escalar y transformas el paisaje para crear pequeños asideros para pies y manos en cualquier dirección de 10 pies de ancho y hasta 60 pies de largo. Cualquiera que intente trepar por la superficie transformada realiza todos los chequeos de Fuerza ({@skill Athletics}) con un bono de +2 y tira con ventaja.

spell.name: Necrotic Visage
entries: Evocas un visaje sombrío que aparece sobre ti. El visaje permanece hasta que usas tu acción para hacer un ataque con un arma cuerpo a cuerpo contra un objetivo dentro del alcance. Con un ataque exitoso, tu ataque es reemplazado por el del visaje sombrío, que golpea a tu objetivo con una guadaña necrótica, infligiendo {@damage 4d6} de daño necrótico y obligando al objetivo a tener éxito en una tirada de salvación de Destreza o a tener su velocidad de movimiento reducida a 0 hasta el final de su próximo turno. A continuación, el visaje desaparece.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Cuando lanzas este hechizo utilizando una ranura de hechizo de 3er nivel o superior, el daño aumenta un {@dice 1d6} por cada nivel de ranura superior al 2º.

spell.name: Pullulate
entries: Plantas una semilla de un tipo de planta que solía crecer en tu ubicación actual. Al tocar el suelo sobre la semilla enterrada y pronunciar una pequeña bendición, la especie de la planta comienza a rebrotar, tardando {@dice 1d4} horas en alcanzar la madurez.

spell.name: Radiating Blade of Tempus
entries: Invocas a Tempus, el dios de la guerra, para que te conceda la capacidad de abatir a tus enemigos en su nombre. Usando tu acción de bonificación, eres capaz de envainar un arma cuerpo a cuerpo que poseas con una llama blanca ardiente. Puedes utilizar tu acción para realizar un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo con la espada de fuego. Al impactar, el objetivo recibe el daño de ataque normal del arma más {@damage 1d8} de daño radiante. La hoja ardiente arroja una luz brillante en un radio de 3 metros y una luz tenue en otros 3 metros.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Cuando lanzas este hechizo utilizando una ranura de hechizo de 3er nivel o superior, el daño aumenta un {@dice 1d8} por cada dos niveles de ranura superiores al 2º.

spell.name: Shadow Bind
entries: Tomas el control de la sombra que pertenece a una criatura para sujetar a su amo. Realiza un ataque de hechizo a distancia contra una criatura que puedas ver dentro del alcance, infligiendo {@damage 2d6} de daño necrótico y agarrando al objetivo. La criatura agarrada puede usar una acción para hacer un chequeo de Fuerza ({@skill Athletics}) o Destreza ({@skill Acrobatics}) (a elección de la criatura) contra tu DC de hechizo, terminando el hechizo si tiene éxito. No puedes controlar la sombra de un objetivo de esta manera si el objetivo está en una luz brillante.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Cuando lanzas este hechizo utilizando una ranura de hechizo de 3er nivel o superior, el daño aumenta un {@dice 1d6} por cada nivel de ranura superior al 2º.

spell.name: Silvanus' Blessing

m.text: a small diamond worth at least 50 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: You return a dead beast you touch to life, provided that it has been dead no longer than 8 hours. If the beast's soul is both willing and at liberty to rejoin the body, the beast returns to life with half of its total hit points, rejuvenated by the blessing of Silvanus.

This spell also neutralizes any poisons and cures nonmagical diseases that affected the beast at the time it died. This spell doesn't, however, remove magical diseases, curses, or similar effects; if these aren't first removed prior to casting the spell, they take effect when the beast returns to life.

This spell closes all mortal wounds, but it doesn't restore missing body parts. If the creature is lacking body parts or organs integral for its survival - its head, for instance - the spell automatically fails.

spell.name: Silvanus' Favor
entries: You touch a willing beast. Until the spell ends, the beast's non-magical attacks become magical attacks with a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the bonus increases to +2. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the bonus increases to +3.

spell.name: Surge of Chaos

time.condition: which you take when you must roll on the {@i Wild Magic} table

entries: When you are forced to roll on the {@table wild magic surge|phb|wild magic} table, you can use your reaction to reroll on the table after seeing the result of your first roll. You must take the second result.

spell.name: Track
entries: You are able to identify the tracks made by a creature if you possess one thing that belonged to the creature. You also gain advantage on Wisdom based skill checks related to the target for the duration.

spell.name: Ubtao's Tiny Teraform
entries: You touch the ground beneath you and ask Ubtao, god of creation, to cause it to vibrate. Each creature in a 20-foot cube below the ground's surface must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 4d6} bludgeoning damage and has its movement speed halved until the end of its next turn on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
You briefly learn the location of each creature that takes damage from this spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Cuando lanzas este hechizo utilizando una ranura de hechizo de 3er nivel o superior, el daño aumenta un {@dice 1d6} por cada nivel de ranura superior al 2º.

spell.name: Veil of Elements
entries: You summon a swirling mass of elements in a 15-foot-radius, 40-foot-tall cylinder centered on a point you can see within range. Each creature that begins their turn in the veil or moves into it during their turn must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d6} damage from an element of your choosing (cold, fire, lightning, thunder) on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one, which expends that damage type from the veil.
The spell ends once all four damage types are expended, or the spell's duration is reached.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage from each element increases {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Whispers of Hellfire

time.condition: which you take when a creature you can see within 90 feet of you dies

entries: With a wave of your hand, you imbue a creature with hellish energy at the moment it dies. Using your reaction when a creature dies within range, you cause its corpse to explode in a ball of fire. Each creature in a 15-foot-sphere centered on the corpse must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 2d8} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: Cuando lanzas este hechizo utilizando una ranura de hechizo de 3er nivel o superior, el daño aumenta un {@dice 1d8} por cada nivel de ranura superior al 2º.

spell.name: Acrid Delight
entries: You touch a piece of food (weighing up to 5 lbs), rotting it from the inside, but maintaining its original taste, texture, appearance and smell. If the piece of food is then eaten by a creature within one hour, the creature must make a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 2d8} poison damage and become poisoned until it completes a long rest. On a successful save the creature takes half the damage and is not poisoned. If the food is not eaten within one hour, it succumbs to its rotten nature and spoils.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each spell slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Alacritous Interpretation
entries: For the duration, you gain the ability to read non-magical texts at a rate of 50 pages per minute and have perfect recollection of any information gained during the spell's duration.

spell.name: Animate Percussion
entries: You may touch one percussion instrument that you possess, bringing it to life under your command for the duration. The instrument can only follow basic commands, such as playing a simple beat. As a bonus action, you can mentally command the instrument you made with this spell if it is within 30 feet of you. Once given an order, the instrument continues to follow it until its task is complete. If you do not issue a command, the instrument will idly play a rhythm that it has been used to play prior to becoming animated.

spell.name: Beguile
entries: You point at a creature within range and suggest a short phrase of up to 5 words, forcing the target to make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature is forced to shout the nearest approximation to the proffered phrase that exists in their native tongue. If the creature fails its saving throw by 5 or more, it can take no other actions during this round.

spell.name: Bone Storm
entries: You conjure shards of bone to shoot forth from your hand in a 15-foot cone in front of you. Creatures in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 5d4} piercing damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d4} and the size of the cone increases by 5 feet for each spell slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Cauterizing Flame
entries: A willing creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to {@dice 2d10} + your spellcasting ability modifier. However, the creature can no longer regain hit points by any other means until it completes a short or long rest. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: The healing increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Creeping Crawling Claw
entries: Choose the hand of a creature that has been severed from its body for longer than 24 hours and grant it sentience. For the duration of the spell, the {@creature crawling claw} (MM pg.44) is under your control and can be commanded using your bonus action. The claw can only understand simple commands.
The claw is under your control for 1 hour, after which it stops obeying you. To reassert control for another hour or to assert control over an existing crawling claw, you may cast this spell again.
If the claw is still alive when the spell ends, it will attempt seek to reunite itself with its rightful owner. If its original owner is dead, the claw will wander off purposelessly.

spell.name: Cursed with Undeath
entries: You touch a humanoid creature that has at least 1 hit point, placing a curse upon it for 1 minute. If the creature dies while the curse is active, it is raised as a {@creature zombie} under your control (the DM has the creature's game statistics). A {@spell remove curse} spell ends this effect when cast upon a living creature.

On each of your turns, you can use a bonus action to mentally command any creature you made with this spell if the creature is within 60 feet of you (issuing the same command to each one if you control multiple creatures).
The creature is under your control for 1 minute, after which it stops obeying any command you've given it.

spell.name: Death's Grasp
entries: Grasping spectral hands sprout from the ground in a 10-foot square starting from a point within range. For the duration, these hands turn the ground in the area into difficult terrain.
Creatures ending their turn in the area must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 3d6} necrotic damage from the spectral hands.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using certain higher-level spell slots, the area covered by the spell increases. With a 3rd-level slot, the area covered becomes a 20-foot square. With a 5th-level slot, the area covered becomes a 30-foot square. With a 7th-level slot, the area covered becomes a 40-foot square. With a 9th-level slot, the area covered becomes a 50-foot square.

spell.name: Detect Chaos and Order
entries: For the duration, you are able to determine the nature of creatures within range in relation to how they conform to societal norms. Creatures will have auras about them relating to their alignment:

items: A crisp, lawful aura for those who follow the rules of society, often at the expense of their personal wishes.
A muddled, neutral aura for those who balance their whims against the expectations of society, doing what they can within the confines of order.
A jagged, chaotic aura for those with a tendency toward acting on their feelings and whims, regardless of society's expectations.

spell.name: Divine Arm
entries: Your deity imbues a melee weapon you currently possess with an essence of their power and launches it at a foe within 60 feet. Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can see within range. If successful, the target takes the weapon's normal damage plus an additional {@damage 2d10} radiant or necrotic damage (your choice). The weapon breaks after it is used in this manner.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Dread
entries: You speak an augury against a creature that you can see within range, filling them with a sense of trepidation. On a failed Wisdom saving throw, the target suffers disadvantage on all attacks against you. Also, the target has disadvantage on Wisdom skill checks made for the duration.
A {@spell remove curse} spell cast on the target ends this effect.

spell.name: Earthen Grip
entries: You target one creature you can see within range, causing them to make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save the target is {@condition restrained} by dirt rising from the ground in the shape of a fist.
The target may use its action to make a Strength saving throw, breaking free from the earth's grasp on a successful save.

spell.name: Earthen Pillar
entries: You call forth a column of dirt to rise out of the ground in a space you can see within range. The pillar has a diameter of 5 feet, a height of 20 feet, an AC of 10 and 15 hit points.

If the pillar is created under a Medium or smaller creature, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity save or be lifted by the pillar. Large creatures make the save with advantage. Huge or bigger creatures are unaffected as the earthen pillar is unable to be created under the creature's weight. A Large or smaller creature can choose to fail the save.

If the pillar is prevented from reaching its full height due to contact with another solid surface, a creature on the pillar takes {@damage 2d6} bludgeoning damage and is {@condition restrained}. The restrained creature can use an action to make a Strength or Dexterity check (creature's choice) against the spell's save DC. On a success, the creature is no longer restrained and must either move or fall off the pillar.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can increase the height of the pillar by 5 feet and the potential damage it deals by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Grimlore's Shadowblight
entries: You hurl a ball of dark energy at a target within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d12} necrotic damage and must make a Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of you until the end of your next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage dealt increases by {@dice 1d12} for every two spell slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Guillotine
entries: You extend your hand and touch a creature while muttering the passing prayer of an executioner. The creature must make a Strength saving throw or become {@condition restrained} by a pair of ethereal chains that bind the target to the ground, and a large magical blade is summoned above their head.

As a bonus action on your turn, you are able to release the blade down upon your target's neck, dealing {@dice 2d8} magical slashing damage. For every round that you do not release the blade with your bonus action after the initial cast, add {@damage 1d8} additional damage as a blade ratchets another notch higher above the target.
The target may use their action to attempt a Strength saving throw to break the chains at the start of each turn. This removes the restrained condition and ends the spell without doing any damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the initial damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Helm's Everwatchful Eye

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range fail a saving throw

entries: You plead for the Vigilant One to use his divine grace to help one of your allies in their time of need. When you see a creature within range fail a saving throw, you can use your reaction to roll a {@dice d20}. On a roll of 16 or higher, Helm will intervene and allow the target to succeed their saving throw instead.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you reduce the die score required by 2 for every slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Inaudible
entries: Choose a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or become unable to cast spells that require a verbal component from 1 school of magic (your choice) for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can select one addition school of magic for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Injurious Spellbook
entries: You transmute the two pages of your spellbook that contain the scripture for this spell to detach from the book's binding and develop razor-sharp edges. Both pages fly out and slice a creature in range, before safely returning to your spellbook and rebinding to their original location. Choose one creature within range or choose two creatures within range that are within 5 feet of each other. For each page, a creature must make a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 2d8} slashing damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} per page ({@dice 2d8} total) for every two spell slots level above 1st.

spell.name: Inner FIre

m.text: a ruby worth 25 gp

entries: The sheer power of your life force causes the blood of your foes to ignite in an inferno. Cause a creature you can see within range to make a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d4} fire damage for every unused hit dice you currently have. You lose up to {@dice 1d4} of your remaining hit dice, consumed by the spell.

spell.name: Interpret Bone
entries: You touch a bone from a creature that has been dead for longer than 10 days but less than a year and are able to see a brief vision of how that creature died.

spell.name: Larloch's Minor Drain
entries: You create a ball of necrotic energy and launch it towards a creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt. If you are at your maximum total hit points, you receive double the amount as temporary hit points instead.

spell.name: Last Breath
entries: You raise your hands in a grasping gesture around a creature's neck and begin to fill their lungs with water. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 1d8} cold damage, and on your turn(s), you can use your action to deal {@damage 1d8} cold damage to the target automatically.

While the target is affected by the spell, it is considered to be holding its breath. The target can hold its breath for 1 + its Constitution modifier minutes (minimum of 30 seconds), then begins choking. The spell ends if you use your action to do anything else or the target moves more than 30 feet away from you or dies. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the spell ends.
This spell has no effect on creatures who don't need to breathe or can breathe underwater.

spell.name: Misery
entries: You extend your hand and touch a creature while muttering a tribulation under your breath; one that dwells in a plane of anguish. Upon casting this spell, the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage and have its soul become tainted. You regain hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

Until the spell ends, if the target is within 30 feet of you at the start of your turns, using your action, you can force it to succeed on a Constitution saving throw take {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage. A creature of your choosing within 5 feet of the target regains hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt. A successful saving throw ends the spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} on each instance of damage for every three spell slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Murmurs of the Restless
entries: You mentally connect with a group of spirits whose lives ended in an unnatural death. The spirits belonging to any creatures within 30 feet of you that died within the last 24 hours simultaneously overwhelm you with the emotions they felt before passing. If there are more than 5 dead creatures in range when casting this spell, make a DC 10 Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, you take {@damage 2d6} psychic damage and cannot cast this spell again until you finish a long rest.

On a successful save, or if there are 5 or fewer dead creatures within range, you are able to briefly sense the emotions of the creatures during their final moments before death. The DM will describe the most prevalent emotions felt by the dead creatures within range, such as "anger," "terror," "guilt," "grief," or "sadness."

spell.name: Nightowl
entries: Selune gives you her blessing, allowing you to summon the mythical spirit of an owl that appears on your shoulder. The owl cannot attack or carry any objects but understands any simple commands you give it up to a mile away. If not given any commands, the owl will sit perched upon your shoulder.
As a bonus action, you are able to see and hear through the perspective of the spirit owl, but you become blinded and deafened while doing so.

spell.name: Rot
entries: You extend your hand toward a humanoid creature you can see within range and infect the target with a horrible disease, causing their flesh to form pustules and smell of decay. The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 2d12} necrotic damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Shed Skin
entries: You channel the peculiarity of reptiles and gain the ability to shed your skin the same manner as a snake. If you cast this spell while being grappled, the condition ends, and you can move up to 15 feet away from your target without provoking attacks of opportunity.

spell.name: Shield of Devotion
entries: A gleaming shield appears around a creature of your choice within range, causing any critical hit against them to become a normal hit for the duration. The target also gains {@dice 1d8} temporary hit points when you cast this spell.

spell.name: Skein of Vines

time.condition: which you take when you are unwillingly pushed or pulled in any direction

entries: When you are unwillingly pushed or pulled in any direction, you call forth vines from the ground to wrap around your legs and prevent you from being moved until the start of your next turn. This spell can only be cast while you are on solid ground.

spell.name: Slashing Step
entries: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you must use the Dash action. When doing so, you enter a semi-incorporeal state and move with increased grace, allowing you to move without provoking an attack of opportunity.
Additionally, you may make a single melee attack against any creature that is within 5 feet of your chosen path, doing your normal attack damage on a hit.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Smolder
entries: You focus on fanning the flames that burn within your soul. Using your bonus action, you are able to add an additional {@damage 1d8} fire damage to the next source of fire damage you deal. You can only have one source of this spell active at a time.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for every slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Storm of Arrows
entries: You chant a minor incantation, brushing the arrows in your quiver with a feather. Upon finishing the casting, spectral duplicates of your arrows appear at a point in the sky you can see with in range, forming a 10-foot radius cylinder up to 40 feet tall. Each creature in the cylinder must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d6} piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each spell slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Zen Archery
entries: You allow insight to guide your ranged weapon attacks. For the duration, when you make an attack with a ranged weapon, you can use your Spellcasting ability modifier instead of Dexterity for all attack and damage rolls.

spell.name: Ascending Flame
entries: A flame-like radiance burns a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} radiant damage, granting you half of the damage dealt as temporary hit points. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Benediction
entries: You touch one willing creature. The target gains a +1 bonus to AC for the next attack made against it, then the spell ends. This effect can only be active on one target at a time.

spell.name: Blood Dagger
entries: As a bonus action on your turn, you are able to create a weapon from the very life-force that sustains you. Casting this spell causes you to immediately take {@damage 1d6} psychic damage, as a small blade that resembles a dagger made of flowing blood appears clutched in your hand.

Attacks with this weapon use your spellcasting modifier for attack rolls and deal {@damage 1d4} slashing damage. Attacks from this weapon are also considered magical and you cannot be disarmed. You can only have one blood dagger created by this spell active at a time. The dagger disappears if it leaves your hand or you dismiss it as a bonus action.
The damage dealt by this weapon increases by {@dice 1d4} at 5th level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).

spell.name: Blood Siphon
entries: You touch a creature with the tip of your finger and attempt to siphon their life force to strengthen your own. Make a melee spell attack against a target, with a successful attack dealing {@damage 1d4} necrotic damage and granting you half of the damage dealt as temporary hit points.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).

spell.name: Bloodlink
entries: You touch two willing creatures and form a brief magical link between them, causing one of the creatures that you select to lose {@dice 1d8} hit points. The other creature gains temporary hit points equal to this lost health.
This amount increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: Bolster
entries: A shimmering magical force appears and shelters you from danger at the cost of your stability. When you are targeted with an attack but before you know if the attack hits, you can roll a {@dice d6}. If the attack hits, the die roll is subtracted from the damage done by a single attack and you fall {@condition prone}. If the attack misses, you fall prone and are {@condition incapacitated} until the end of your next turn. The spell then ends.
This amount increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Comendation
entries: You touch a willing creature and say a short prayer, warding the target against danger by granting it advantage on its next saving throw.

spell.name: Conflagrate
entries: You burn a target and make them susceptible to fire. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d6} fire damage and is marked with a fiery rune for the duration of the spell. In any round after the one when this spell is cast, a target that takes fire damage from any source takes an additional {@damage 1d6} fire damage. This effect can only occur once per round.
Both instances of this spell's damage increase by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Corruption
entries: You touch the ground beneath your feet to imbue it with a faint necrotic energy. This energy glows with a green dim light in a 10-foot radius. As a bonus action on your turn, you can cause the energy to travel through the ground centered on a place you can see within 30 feet of you.
Any creature other than yourself making an attack while standing on the corrupted ground does so with a -2 attack penalty.
The distance you can move the corruption increases by an additional 10 feet when you reach 5th level (40 feet), 11th level (50 feet), and 17th level (60 feet).

spell.name: Courage
entries: You touch a willing creature and strengthen its resolve. Until the end of the creature's next turn, it cannot be {@condition frightened}. If the target is currently frightened, it can immediately reroll its saving throw if one was required to avoid the condition.

spell.name: Dazzle
entries: You create a flash of blinding light directly in front of a creature that you can see within range. The target is subjected to a Charisma saving throw. On a failure, it has disadvantage on its next attack, or grants advantage on the next attack made against it, whichever comes first.
The target must be able to see in order to suffer these effects.

spell.name: Disarm
entries: As an action, choose a creature you can see within 60 feet. That creature must make a Strength saving throw with advantage or drop an object or weapon they are holding in their hand. This spell has no effect if they are holding the object with two hands.

If they are holding two items (one in each hand), select which item they drop. If they fail the saving throw by a score of 5 or greater, the item flies out of their hand in a direction of your choosing, up to 10 feet away from their original location.

spell.name: Eidolic Chains
entries: A creature that you can see within range must succeed on a Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) skill check (target's choice) vs your spell DC or become grappled. The target may attempt another skill check at the start of each of its turns to break the grapple.

spell.name: Glacial Blade
entries: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you must make a melee attack with a weapon against one creature within the spell's range, otherwise the spell fails. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, and it becomes encased in a sheath of ice until the start of your next turn. If the target uses its action to make a weapon attack, it immediately takes {@damage 1d8} cold damage, and the spell ends.

At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} cold damage to the target, and the damage the target takes for making a weapon attack increases to {@dice 2d8}. Both damage rolls increase by {@dice 1d8} at 11th level and 17th level.

spell.name: Gleam
entries: You may use your reaction to cause your physical form to emit a bright flash of light. This flash will shed bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet, centered on yourself. Additionally, if you are currently being grappled by a creature, it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 2d6} radiant damage and drop its grapple.

spell.name: Gloom
entries: You touch one object that is 5 feet or smaller in any single dimension. Until the spell ends, the object absorbs natural light in a 15-foot radius sphere. Within that sphere, Bright Light becomes Dim Light and Dim Light becomes Darkness. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action.

spell.name: Grim Scythe

components.m: a handful of hay seed and a quarterstaff

entries: For the duration, a spectral blade forms on the end of a quarterstaff you touch. While this blade lasts, you use your spellcasting ability instead of Strength for the attack and damage rolls of two-handed melee attacks. The weapon also becomes magical if it isn't, it deals necrotic damage instead of bludgeoning, and its damage die becomes a {@dice d10}. The spell ends if you cast it again or if you let go of the weapon.

spell.name: Grimlore's Influence
entries: Any creatures of your choice that are within 30 feet and {@condition frightened} of you take {@damage 1d6} psychic damage.

This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} and the range increases by 5 feet when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}, 35 feet), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}, 40 feet), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}, 45 feet).

spell.name: Hinder
entries: You assault a Medium or smaller creature you can see within range with an invisible force. The creature must succeed on a Strength saving throw or have its movement speed halved until the end of its next turn.
At 5th level you can target creature of Large size, at 11th level you can target Huge size, and at 17th level you can target Gargantuan creatures.

spell.name: Ice Shard
entries: An icy shard shoots from your outstretched hand. Make a ranged spell attack against a single creature, dealing {@damage 1d6} cold damage on a successful attack. If your attack roll deals critical damage, the target becomes vulnerable to cold damage until the start of your next turn. Creatures resistant or immune to cold damage do not become vulnerable.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Lullaby
entries: This spell sends a creature into a magical slumber. Roll {@dice 3d4}; this is the amount of hit points this spell can affect. Compare this amount to the hit points of a creature you can see within range of the spell. If the total equals or exceeds the target's hit points, it falls {@condition unconscious} until the spell ends, the target takes damage, or someone uses an action to shake or slap it awake. If the total is less than the target's hit points, it has disadvantage on Wisdom based skill checks until the spell ends or someone takes a hostile action against it.
The amount of hit points this spell can affect increases by {@dice 2d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 5d4}), 11th level ({@dice 7d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 9d4}).

spell.name: Manipulate Shadow
entries: As a bonus action, you are able to manipulate the shadow belonging to a creature of Medium size or smaller that you can see within range. This manipulation can take several forms, such as making it act out simple actions independent from its owner, move up to 30 feet away from its owner, or to alter its shape one size larger or smaller than its owner.

You may only manipulate one shadow at a time with this spell. Should the source of the shadow move from its original location, the shadow will follow its owner but remain under your control for up to the duration while within a range of 120 feet.

spell.name: Night Terror
entries: You conjure an Small shadowy figure in an area that you can see within range that remains until it is slain or the spell ends. The shadowy figure has 10 Hit Points, an Armor Class of 14 and a movement speed of 0. When you cast the spell, you can command the shadowy figure to assault the mind of a creature within 30 feet of it that you can see. The target must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or take {@damage 1d8} psychic damage.
As an action, you can repeat the attack against a creature within 30 feet of it that you can see.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: Pacify
entries: When you have at least one Hit Die remaining, you may touch a willing creature and spend a single hit die, healing your target for that amount + your Constitution modifier. A creature can only receive the benefit of this spell once per long rest.

spell.name: Peaceful Valediction
entries: You touch one corpse, and for the next 10 minutes, the target can't become undead by any means short of a {@spell Wish} spell. You can only affect one target with this spell at a time.

spell.name: Phase
entries: When you are targeted with an attack, you may use your reaction in an attempt to phase through a single attack made against you, imposing disadvantage on that attack.
If the attack against you is still successful, you become {@condition incapacitated} until the end of your next turn.

spell.name: Rancorous-Mist Blade
entries: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you must make a melee attack with a weapon against one creature within the spell's range, otherwise the spell fails. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, and it becomes engulfed in a 5-foot square of acidic mist. If the target does not move out of this square by the start of your next turn, it immediately takes {@damage 1d8} acid damage, and the spell ends.

This spell's damage and effected area increase when you reach higher levels. At 5th level, the damage is increased by {@dice 1d8} and the area covered by the mist is 10 feet in a line away from you, affecting any creatures in the mist at the start of your next turn. Both the damage and area's line increase by {@dice 1d8} and 5 feet at 11th level and 17th level.

spell.name: Reassurance
entries: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to one attack roll of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the attack roll. The spell then ends.

spell.name: Shadow Embrace
entries: You cause shadows to manifest around a creature within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw or receive a -2 penalty to their attack rolls and disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws until the end of their next turn as they become engulfed by a dark embrace.

spell.name: Shadow Ink
entries: You pull shadows into a swirling mass inside an empty vial you possess. As long as the vial is open, you are able to use its new contents as 1 ounce of pitch-black ink. If the vial is stoppered, or 1-hour passes, the ink dissipates back into shadow; any writing that has already been made with the ink is unaffected.

spell.name: Shawl of the Unseen
entries: You touch a Medium or smaller creature, enveloping it in a 10-foot-radius sphere of dark mist. The mist lasts for the duration or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it. While active, the mist grants the target advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) skill checks for the duration.
At 5th level you can target creatures of Large size, at 11th level you can target creatures of Huge size, and at 17th level you can target creatures of Gargantuan size.

spell.name: Song of the Dead
entries: You perform a haunting tune that causes spirits of the dead to stir. Make a ranged spell attack against a target within range. On a hit, an incorporeal entity materializes and deals {@damage 1d4} necrotic damage to the target. Additionally, the target cannot take reactions until the start of its next turn.
You can select an additional target within range at 5th level (2 targets), 11th level (3 targets), and 17th level (4 targets).

spell.name: Spare the Living
entries: You feed off fragments of life-force from the dying. Select a humanoid that has 0 Hit Points and is not stable that you can see within range. The target must succeed a Death saving throw. On a failure, the creature inches closer to death and you gain {@dice 1d4} temporary hit points. Alternatively, you can target a humanoid corpse that has died within the last minute to gain this benefit. You cannot use the same corpse more than once.
You gain one additional {@dice 1d4} temporary hit points at 5th level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).

spell.name: Thieves' Ruse
entries: You make an object, up to 5 pounds that you possess, invisible for up to 10 minutes. Once the spell ends, you can't make the same object invisible again for 24 hours.

spell.name: Thunderous Chord
entries: You release a blast of sound that can be heard up to 60 feet away. A creature that you can see within range must make a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 2d4} thunder damage and become  {@condition deafened} until the end of its next turn.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 2d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 4d4}), 11th ({@dice 6d4}), and 17th ({@dice 8d4}).

spell.name: Tormenting Flame
entries: When you are hit with an attack that deals critical damage, you are able to strike back at your attacker with a blast of fire. After the damage is dealt, make a ranged spell attack against your attacker if you can see them and they are within range. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 1d12} fire damage.
This spell deals an additional {@damage 1d12} fire damage when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d12}), 11th level ({@dice 3d12}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d12}).

spell.name: Unhinging Inclination
entries: You touch a creature and attempt to sear their mind with pain depending on how different their beliefs are from your own. Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can see. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d4} force damage if its moral identity (good, neutral, or evil) differs from your own. Additionally, if the target's ideals towards society and order (lawful, neutral, or chaotic) also differ from your own, it takes an additional {@damage 1d4} force damage. If the target shares your alignment, the spell has no effect. This spell does not reveal a creature's alignment to you.
Both instances of this spell's damage increase by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).

spell.name: Unholy Flame
entries: A purple flame descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.
This spell's damage increases by {@damage 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d8}), 11th level ({@damage 3d8}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d8}).

spell.name: Veil

time.condition: which you take when you are hit by a melee attack that deals damage

entries: A thick pale mist radiates from you after you take damage from from a melee attack. You are treated as having total cover, but are {@condition blinded} and {@condition deafened} until the end of your next turn, or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it.

spell.name: Venomous Strike

components.m: a weapon or piece of ammo

entries: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you embue a magical poison on a weapon or piece of ammo you touch and must make an attack with a it against one creature within the weapon's range, otherwise the spell fails. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects plus {@damage 1d4} poison damage. If your attack roll deals critical damage, the target becomes {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn. Targets resistant or immune to poison damage or immune to the poisoned condition do not become poisoned.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: This spell deals an additional {@damage 1d4} poison damage when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d4}), 11th level ({@damage 3d4}) and 17th level ({@damage 4d4}).

spell.name: Wind Slash
entries: A blade of wind flies from your outstretched hands in a straight line up to 15 feet in a direction you choose. If the blade would strike a creature, it must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 1d8} slashing damage and then the spell ends.
This spell deals an additional {@damage 1d8} slashing damage when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d8}), 11th level ({@damage 3d8}) and 17th level ({@damage 4d8}).
